  "description": "Razley Prints Limited is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Videographer

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)

Job Summary


	The Videographer is responsible for planning, shooting, and editing high-quality video content that showcases the company&rsquo;s printing capabilities, production processes, products, services, and brand story.
	This role supports marketing, sales, customer education, and internal communication by producing creative and engaging videos tailored for digital platforms, social media, and customer presentations.


Key Responsibilities
Video Production:


	Capture high-quality video footage of printing processes, equipment, and finished products.
	Film factory operations, customer testimonials, events, and behind-the-scenes content.
	Operate professional cameras, lighting setups, audio equipment, and drones (if applicable).
	Maintain consistent visual style aligned with brand guidelines.


Pre-Production:


	Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to understand project goals and develop video concepts.
	Create storyboards, shot lists, and production plans.
	Scout locations within the facility to determine lighting and sound conditions.


Post-Production:


	Edit footage into polished videos using professional editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).
	Add graphics, animations, text overlays, and sound design to enhance storytelling.
	Ensure color correction and sound mixing meet quality standards.
	Export videos in formats optimized for social media, websites, and presentations.


Content Creation &amp; Branding:


	Develop video content for promotional campaigns, product launches, tutorials, and social media marketing.
	Assist in capturing photos for marketing materials, catalogs, and the company website.
	Work closely with the design team to maintain cohesive branding across all media.


Technical &amp; Equipment Management:


	Organize, operate, and maintain video, lighting, and audio equipment.
	Manage storage, backups, and archiving of video files and footage.
	Stay updated on new video technologies, techniques, and industry trends.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a B.Sc Degree with 1 - 3 years of work experience.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@razleyprints.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Our focus is quality, fair pricing, customer comfort, and consistency. We aim to create an environment where customers can walk in, find what they want easily, and enjoy outstanding service from our trained staff.&nbsp;At ValueMart, we believe that shopping should be stress-free, quick, and enjoyable, making us the preferred choice for residents and businesses in our area.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Location:&nbsp;Abule-Egba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

	Valuemart Supermarket and StaanBite Fast Food are looking for a detail-oriented, trustworthy, and proactive Inventory Officer to join our growing team.
	The ideal candidate will oversee stock movement across our supermarket and fast-food operations, ensure accurate records, and support smooth daily operations.&nbsp;


Key Responsibilities


	Monitor and control stock levels across all departments.
	Carry out daily, weekly, and monthly stock counts.
	Maintain accurate inventory records using our POS/stock system.
	Track product expiry dates, damages, and fast-moving items.
	Work with procurement to ensure timely replenishment.
	Reconcile physical stock with system records.
	Prepare stock reports for management.

	Performance bonuses.

        ValueMart is a fast-growing neighborhood supermarket committed to providing families and individuals with a convenient, reliable, and affordable shopping experience. Located in Lagos, ValueMart offers a well-curated selection of essential goods ranging from groceries, beverages, household items, toiletries, cosmetics, baby products, fresh produce, snacks, and more.

Our focus is quality, fair pricing, customer comfort, and consistency. We aim to create an environment where customers can walk in, find what they want easily, and enjoy outstanding service from our trained staff. At ValueMart, we believe that shopping should be stress-free, quick, and enjoyable, making us the preferred choice for residents and businesses in our area.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Inventory Officer

Job Location: Abule-Egba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	Valuemart Supermarket and StaanBite Fast Food are looking for a detail-oriented, trustworthy, and proactive Inventory Officer to join our growing team.
	The ideal candidate will oversee stock movement across our supermarket and fast-food operations, ensure accurate records, and support smooth daily operations. 


Key Responsibilities


	Monitor and control stock levels across all departments.
	Carry out daily, weekly, and monthly stock counts.
	Maintain accurate inventory records using our POS/stock system.
	Track product expiry dates, damages, and fast-moving items.
	Work with procurement to ensure timely replenishment.
	Reconcile physical stock with system records.
	Prepare stock reports for management.
	Prevent stock loss through proper documentation and controls.


Requirements


	Minimum OND / HND / B.Sc. in any relevant field.
	1–3 years of experience as an Inventory Officer or Storekeeper (retail/food industry preferred).
	Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
	Good knowledge of POS or inventory management systems.
	Must be trustworthy, organized, and proactive.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.
	Must live within or close to Abule-Egba / Agege / Iyana-Ipaja / Alakuko / Ojokoro axis.


Salary & Benefits


	Competitive monthly salary: N100,000 - N120,000 Monthly (based on experience). 
	Performance bonuses.
	Staff meals (StaanBite).
	Opportunity for growth within the organization.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: otunbawilliams.a@gmail.com using “Inventory Officer – Valuemart/StaanBite” as the subject of the mail.
